Articles.Content: When will the console versions be updated? since pc versions got the 1.2 but nothing was said for consoles.

On 10/12/2016 at 3:57 PM, BragFury7 said:

When will the console versions be updated? since pc versions got the 1.2 but nothing was said for consoles.

Wow! Posted over 10 days ago and still no answers from a moderator. Com'on devs we want answers!!!!!! That's all we usually ask for when it comes to getting patches. We all know it takes time to identify and fix the issues but really... this long without a patch or answers. Just update us on the progress you have or have not made with the bug fixes. 1.2 update for the PC but nothing for console??? We have owned this game on console for quite some time without a single patch. Could you at least release a hot fix for some of the other issues besides the crashes and corrupt save data????? We expect to have a working product when us as the consumer pay for it!!!! Something like deserves refunds because now the game is starting to become more a hassle to play than anything. Play for 3 hours, make great progress and just like that...All fun is over with a game crash and corrupt save data. Yeah sure we can back up our saves but still not fun to put in so many hours playing for it to just screw you in the end. We need and want something that will fix this awesomely addictive but terribly broken game....

3 hours ago, Greenthumb Gaming said:

Posted over 10 days ago and still no answers from a moderator.

While I appreciate that you are upset, you seem to be misunderstanding what the moderators here do. We are volunteers who help run the forum, we don't have any inside information about what is happening with development of the console versions.

11 hours ago, Red Iron Crown said:

While I appreciate that you are upset, you seem to be misunderstanding what the moderators here do. We are volunteers who help run the forum, we don't have any inside information about what is happening with development of the console versions.

Hello,

I'm very sorry for the misunderstanding. My frustration was getting the best of me at the moment. I did say that incorrectly and was really directing this toward the staff. I really am not sure why I said that but I'm just starting to get very upset and frustrated with not being able to play this game because of all the bugs and corrupt data. When I bought the game I had no idea it would give me so much grief. Please understand that I did not mean to upset anyone further. I just wanted to get my point across and my frustration with everything. Again I'm very sorry. Thanks for letting me know.
